document.docAuthor: Jia, Fenglong, Lin, Renchao, Chan, Eric, Skale, Andre & Fikáček, Martin
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Coelostoma Brullé, 1835 from China and additional faunistic records of the genus from the Oriental Region (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae: Sphaeridiinae: Coelostomatini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Coelostoma Brullé, 1835 from China and additional faunistic records of the genus from the Oriental Region (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae: Sphaeridiinae: Coelostomatini)

subSubSection.paragraph:
New material examined. CHINA : Yunnan :
6 spec. ( CLSHU ): Mengla , Wangtianshu ,
6-7.viii.2007
, Guo-dong Ren , Wen-jun Hou , Ya-lin Li lgt.
;
1 male ( CLSHU ): Mengla ,
9.viii.2007
, Fu-ming Shi , Shao-li Mao lgt.
;
1 female ( CLSHU ): Yuanyang County ,
27.vii.2006
, Ben-yong Mao lgt. 3 spec. ( NMW ), Xishuangbanna , eastern Jingdong City ,
12.xi.1999
, ca.
500m
, Jäch et al. lgt. (
CWBS 380
)
.

6 km NW Mengla
,

, ca.

, A. Weigel lgt
